channel.title: Need help with hosting!
channel.description: I have a problem with hosting as you can see, i have been trying to host for about 2 years with no success please could you help me with hosting? I made a No-Ip account and made the server ip address but it doesent let me on it just think's and then says "Error connecting to server" and it doesen't work i have run working and i have tried many sources and none work. I use a "Speedtouch 780" (o2 wireless box) im nto sure if that help's but ill put it in anyway incase it does help =]. I have tried updating using No-Ip DUC as well, still no success someone help me out pleeeaase!

item.title: Need help with hosting!
item.dc:creator: @Scapevoy Scapevoy
item.description:
@Scapevoy wrote:

Dude, Im using the same speedtouch and got my server on :))))

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with hosting!
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

When you go to you server, you(yourself ad hoster) not suppose to put the ip

address example: ******.no-ip.org

just put name,pass and port

Read full topic
